sentences.sentence: Mr Harper turned a customary recess into prorogation.
sentences.translation: 会期内的惯例休会被哈珀拖成了会期间休会。

sentences.sentence: Dedicated to the service of education and prorogation of the human culture HBEP has consistently pursued good taste, the best flavor and perfect image.
sentences.translation: 河北教育出版社始终坚持“大教育”观念，以人类优秀文化的积累与传承为己任，努力追求品位、追求风格、追求形象、追求境界。
